sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
reasonable
, se vede pošteno in razumno.

seg.quote: I can't do that, Morris. Be reasonable.
The landlords responded with great reasonableness.

sense.def:
Odločitev ali razlaga, ki je
reasonable
, vsebuje dobre razloge za to, da mislimo, da je pravilna.

seg.quote: There was no reasonable explanation for her decision.
It was quite reasonable to suppose that he wanted the money too.

sense.def:
Količina, ki je
reasonable
, je precej velika.

seg.quote: A reasonable number of students are involved.

sense.def:
Kadar je cena
reasonable
, je poštena in ne previsoka.
